string.text: Spare parts. Here is the list. %c[d_orange][$price_for_part rub] %c[d_green][$time_to_part]
Upgrade kits. Here is the list. %c[d_orange][$price_for_upgr rub] %c[d_green][$time_to_upgr]
The order is done. I'll contact you when he arrives.
